gameSettings

类 Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameSettings.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class that record if the debug mode is open.
    作者:
    Lekang Jiang

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Debug getdebug()
      Getter for singleton class debugger.
      boolean isDebugActive()
      Check if the debug mode is open.
      void toggleDebug()
      Switch the debug mode.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getdebug

        public static Debug getdebug()
        Getter for singleton class debugger.
        返回:
        m_debugger

      • isDebugActive

        public boolean isDebugActive()
        Check if the debug mode is open.

      • toggleDebug

        public void toggleDebug()
        Switch the debug mode.
